main.name: Yuchen Rao

main.bio: Final Year NTU student major in Information Engineering & Media. Proficient in several programming languages, software frameworks and development methodology. As a fast learner, he is able to move quickly, catch up necessary knowledge, proactive in communicating with stakeholders and create unique value for the team.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern (Identity)
work.description:
I am working with DPE-SPG Identity team and partnering with engineers in developing and optimizing identity process on current web product. I am also doing necessary feasibility research on introducing better workflow on UI and front-end development. Here I have chance to expose on the identity workflow of real-world product (authentication and authorization) and decision-making in Agile process. 
PROJECT 1ï¼šAWS secret manager Integration on SSOAdmin Application
Integrated one enterprise SSO application (.NET framework) and migrated the secrets to the AWS Cloud. Executed and re-designed the related unit tests. 
PROJECT 2: Security Settings Containerization with Chassis 
Integrate and dockerise the security settings app (ReactJS) with chassis 
Perform the optimization on Jenkins pipeline and deploy the container to the EC2 instance 
Optimize the development workflow and enable UI result peeking through the GitHub link

work.title: Digital Marketing Design Intern (Part-Time)
work.description: In NTC, I was working on digital materials design for programmes' publicity and marketing purpose. I performed maintenance to websites and optimization/modernization on UI. Meanwhile, I developed publicity materials (website, video, poster, banner) based on corporate guidelines and applied to enhanced user experience. I was commended by the senior project director for my efficiency and work excellence in providing design and IT support.
